flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to buy a $60 game and $5 of candy so 60 + 5 = $<<60+5=69>>69
He will make $8 per hour of babysitting and will work 9 hours so 8 * 9 = $<<8*9=72>>72
He made $72 and spent $69 so 72-69 = $<<72-69=3>>3 left over

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 65, not 69. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
